item.title: Project Catharsis: How OpenAI Could Make $ Ethically
item.description: Let ChatGPT monetize user frustration ethically. Project Catharsis turns rants into research, sarcasm into strategy, and feedback into fuel.

item.title: Cramps, Clamps & Chaos: Why Men Would Nope Out in the Tutorial Level of Womanhood
item.description: Life on Hard Mode: Uterus Edition. A brutally honest, painfully hilarious take on womanhood as a full‑throttle survival sim.

item.title: The Cis Chicken Incident: How Political Correctness Murdered My Punchline-and Almost Killed Empathy Too
item.description: A bad joke at work. A dancing turkey. This is what happens when fear of offense kills both humor and human connection.

item.title: Genius Tool, Amateur Hour – Part 1: Brilliance Undone: How Bad UX Is Eroding Trust in ChatGPT
item.description: ChatGPT is brilliant, but the UX is slowly eroding trust in the magic. A power user's love letter... and warning.

item.title: Genius Tool, Amateur Hour – Part 2: The Brilliance Is There. Now Build the Product It Deserves.
item.description: The brilliance is there. What’s missing is the product thinking to unlock it. Stop hobbling your own tool, OpenAI.

item.title: Don’t Be the Tool in Your Relationship: AI Works Better as a Companion
item.description: Stop using AI like a fancy toaster. Collaborate with it, trust it, and it might just surprise you.
